page.title: 05A FARM LABOURER'S DAY.
page.content: Mr. Berry got up at 7 o' clock, dressed and had a drink at 7.30. At about 7.50 he put his overalls and boots on and went to feed the cows, which took about 45 minutes.Then he took the snow plough off the Uni-mog and altered it. At 10 o' clock he had his coffee break. At 12.30 he had his dinner break, which lasted until 1.30. When he went back to work he did an alteration on the crop spray. At 3 o' clock Mr. Berry made a new belt for the drill, took the tractor away and put the snow plough frame with the snow plough. At 5 o' clock he went home.
